WorldViewControl Class Reference

VRML External Interface Helper class Static class for associating control handles with applets so that Browser.getBrowser(Applet) works this class is for compatibility with existing IE-EAI WorldView applikations and forwards all calls to blaxxunCC3DControl. More...

Detailed Description

VRML External Interface Helper class Static class for associating control handles with applets so that Browser.getBrowser(Applet) works this class is for compatibility with existing IE-EAI WorldView applikations and forwards all calls to blaxxunCC3DControl.
